urlset:
http://example.com/page1 daily 0.8
http://example.com/page2 weekly 0.6
A sitemap.xml file is used to provide information about the pages, videos, and other files on a website, and how they are organized. Search engines like Google use this file to better understand the structure of a site and index its content more effectively. file:
